caption.title: Ultrastructural analysis of TBEV-infected Caco-2 cells by ultrathin section transmission electron microscopy.
caption.p: All photographs were taken at 12(rER) containing TBEV are indicated by asterisks and ribosomes of the rER are indicated by small vertical arrows. (A) bar = 1 µm, (B) bar = 500 nm, (C) bar = 500 nm, (D) bar = 200 nm.
